description.zh-cn: 中国战国末期思想家，韩国的宗室公子，法家思想的代表人物与集大成者。
description.en: A thinker from the late Warring States period of ancient China, a prince of the state of Han, and a representative and synthesizer of the Legalist school of thought.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，曾与韩非一同师从荀子，后因嫉妒其才华而进谗言将其害死。
description.en: Prime Minister of the Qin dynasty, who studied under Xunzi alongside Han Fei and later had him killed out of jealousy.

description.zh-cn: 战国末期儒家大师，韩非和李斯的老师。
description.en: A Confucian master during the late Warring States period, and the teacher of Han Fei and Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，后来的秦朝第一位皇帝。他因欣赏韩非的著作而召其至秦国，但最终下令将其囚禁。
description.en: The king of the state of Qin, who later became the first emperor of the Qin dynasty. He summoned Han Fei to Qin after admiring his writings but ultimately ordered his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的著作集，法家思想的代表作。
description.en: A collection of Han Fei's works, representative of Legalist thought.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，韩非的祖国。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States and Han Fei's home state.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诸子百家之一，强调以“法”、“术”、“势”治国。韩非是其集大成者。
description.en: One of the Hundred Schools of Thought in ancient China, emphasizing governance by law, method, and authority. Han Fei is considered its greatest synthesizer.

description.zh-cn: 道家学派的创始人，其思想对韩非有重要影响。
description.en: Founder of the Taoist school of thought, whose ideas significantly influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期韩国君主，韩非曾多次向其上书游说但未被采纳。
description.en: A monarch of the state of Han during the Warring States period, to whom Han Fei submitted memorials multiple times without his advice being adopted.

description.zh-cn: 韩国末代君主，在秦国威胁下派遣韩非出使秦国。
description.en: The last king of the state of Han, who dispatched Han Fei as an envoy to the state of Qin under military threat.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》中的一篇，其内容深受秦王政赞赏。
description.en: A chapter in the 'Han Feizi' that was highly admired by King Zheng of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》中的一篇，其内容深受秦王政赞赏。
description.en: A chapter in the 'Han Feizi' that was highly admired by King Zheng of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦国大臣，与李斯一同诬陷韩非。
description.en: A minister of the state of Qin who, along with Li Si, slandered Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，最终统一中国。韩非在此地去世。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States, which eventually unified China. Han Fei died in its territory.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想流派，韩非的学说追本溯源于道家黄老之术。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought; Han Fei's theories traced their origins back to the Huang-Lao school of Taoism.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想流派，韩非反对其建构在私人情感联系上的治国理念。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought whose philosophy of governance, based on personal emotional connections, was opposed by Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 法家代表人物，其思想影响了韩非。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school whose thought influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 法家代表人物，其思想影响了韩非。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school whose thought influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 法家代表人物，其思想影响了韩非。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school whose thought influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 法家先驱，其思想影响了韩非。
description.en: A forerunner of the Legalist school whose thought influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 约前255年至前247年间，韩非拜于儒家大师荀子门下学习。
description.en: Between approximately 255 BCE and 247 BCE, Han Fei studied under the Confucian master Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 约前255年至前247年间，李斯与韩非一同拜于儒家大师荀子门下学习。
description.en: Between approximately 255 BCE and 247 BCE, Li Si studied under the Confucian master Xunzi alongside Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 李斯因嫉妒韩非的才华，与姚贾一同向秦王政进谗言诬陷韩非，并最终在狱中将其毒死。
description.en: Out of jealousy of Han Fei's talent, Li Si, along with Yao Jia, slandered Han Fei to King Zheng of Qin and ultimately had him poisoned to death in prison.

description.zh-cn: 姚贾与李斯一同向秦王政进谗言诬陷韩非，导致其下狱。
description.en: Yao Jia, along with Li Si, slandered Han Fei to King Zheng of Qin, leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政听信李斯、姚贾的谗言，下令将韩非投入监狱。
description.en: King Zheng of Qin heeded the slander of Li Si and Yao Jia and ordered Han Fei to be imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政读到《韩非子》中的《孤愤》与《五蠹》等篇后，大加赞赏，并表示希望能见到作者。
description.en: After reading chapters like 'Gufen' and 'Wudu' from the 'Han Feizi', King Zheng of Qin expressed great admiration and a desire to meet the author.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政读到《韩非子》中的《孤愤》与《五蠹》等篇后，大加赞赏，并表示希望能见到作者。
description.en: After reading chapters like 'Gufen' and 'Wudu' from the 'Han Feizi', King Zheng of Qin expressed great admiration and a desire to meet the author.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政以战争威胁韩国，迫使韩王安派遣韩非出使秦国。
description.en: King Zheng of Qin used the threat of war against the state of Han to compel King An of Han to send Han Fei as an envoy to Qin.

description.zh-cn: 在秦国急攻的压力下，韩王安派遣韩非出使秦国。
description.en: Under the pressure of an imminent attack from Qin, King An of Han dispatched Han Fei as an envoy to the state of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 韩非多次上书游说韩悼惠王，但他的建议均未被采纳。
description.en: Han Fei submitted memorials to King Daohui of Han on multiple occasions, but his advice was never adopted.

description.zh-cn: 在派遣韩非出使秦国之前，韩王安一直不采纳韩非的政治主张。
description.en: Prior to dispatching Han Fei to Qin, King An of Han consistently did not adopt Han Fei's political proposals.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》一书的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the book 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是韩国的宗室公子。
description.en: Han Fei was a prince of the royal clan of the state of Han.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是法家思想的集大成者，主张“法”、“术”、“势”三者并重。
description.en: Han Fei was the great synthesizer of Legalist thought, advocating for the combined importance of 'fa' (law), 'shu' (method), and 'shi' (authority).

description.zh-cn: 韩非是荀子的弟子，其思想受到荀子尊君思想和对礼法重视的影响，但他将后者发展为重视“刑名法术”之学。
description.en: Han Fei was a student of Xunzi, and his thought was influenced by Xunzi's ideas on honoring the ruler and the importance of rites and law. However, he developed the latter into an emphasis on the study of 'punishments and names, law, and method'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的学说追本溯源于黄老之术，他对《道德经》有深入研究，并著有《解老》、《喻老》等篇。
description.en: Han Fei's theories traced their origins to the Huang-Lao school of thought; he conducted in-depth research on the 'Tao Te Ching' and wrote chapters such as 'Jie Lao' and 'Yu Lao'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非总结并吸收了法家代表人物商鞅的思想。
description.en: Han Fei summarized and absorbed the ideas of Shang Yang, a representative figure of the Legalist school.

description.zh-cn: 韩非总结并吸收了法家代表人物申不害的思想。
description.en: Han Fei summarized and absorbed the ideas of Shen Buhai, a representative figure of the Legalist school.

description.zh-cn: 韩非总结并吸收了法家代表人物慎到的思想。
description.en: Han Fei summarized and absorbed the ideas of Shen Dao, a representative figure of the Legalist school.

description.zh-cn: 韩非的思想受到了法家先驱李悝的影响。
description.en: Han Fei's thought was influenced by Li Kui, a forerunner of the Legalist school.

description.zh-cn: 韩非反对儒家建构在私人情感联系上的治国理念，主张将人的自利本性作为社会秩序建立的前提。
description.en: Han Fei opposed the Confucian idea of governance based on personal emotional connections, arguing that the establishment of social order should be premised on human nature's self-interest.
